title: The Affordable Housing Component under the Scheme shall be handed over alongwith the 1/4th part of the total plot of land, free of cost to the Special Planning Authority for Bhiwandi Surrounding Notified Area
clause_text: The Affordable Housing Component under the Scheme shall be handed over alongwith the 1/4th part of the total plot of land, free of cost to the Special Planning Authority for Bhiwandi Surrounding Notified Area.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
